title: The Edinburgh gazetteer, or geographical dictionary ...
snippet: Newmills, a village of Scotland, in Fifeshire, on the verge of the county, being divided from Perthshire by a rivulet.

title: The complete works of Robert Burns :
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: I set out on Monday, and would have come by Kilmarnock, but there are several small sums owing me for my first edition about Galston and Newmills, and I shall set off so early as to dispatch my business and reach Glasgow by night.

title: The complete poetical and prose works of Robert Burns:
author: Burns, Robert
